title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be at a point where you can forgive a relative for an injustice committed against you. It may not matter if it was an act they performed yesterday or decades ago. Youre likely just tired of carrying around your own anger and hurt. Youre ready to move on. Thankfully, you can drop the battle now that combative Mars in your 7th House of Relationships releases its grip on a stressful alignment. Strive for peace, whether you pardon your offender in person or only in your heart. Author Cherie Carter-Scott wrote, Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
